text: The men's hammer throw event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 18 October. A 7257g (senior implement) hammer was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Eşref Apak ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Dylan ==Participation== According to an unofficial count, 14 athletes from 12 countries participated in the event. ==References== Hammer throw Category:Hammer throw at the World Athletics U20 Championships
